main.get_file_location:
please enter the folder location which trains.txt is located
the last char should be '\'(for windows)
the folder location:
tkinter.exitinfo: Do you want to quit the program?
info.gettrainnum: input the train num(contains '|', like C114|C114):
info.gettraintype: please select the type of train:%s :
info.getmaxspd: please enter the speed limit of train:%s :
info.getcomposition.desc4: L = locomotive (or control post), C = cargo car, P = passenger car
info.getcomposition: please enter the composition of the train:%s :
info.getflag.desc3: Each f is one flag. 0 = flag not set, 1 = flag set, X = position not used
info.getflag.desc6: #2 NoBrakingPenalization - if set (1), train does NOT receive
info.getflag: please enter the flags of the train:%s:
info.getstop: please select the stop for train:%s:
info.getstoptrack:
please select the stop track:
0 for any track
info.getarrivetime:
please enter the time train arrives at the station:
format: hh:mm:ss
info.getstoptime: please enter the time train stops at the station(in minutes):
warning.notenoughstops:
too little stops!
 at least 2 stops should be added
